summary: Integrated Phase 6.9 postmortem into documentation. File created at /docs/release_notes/PHASE_6.9_POSTMORTEM.md, link added to docs/RELEASE_NOTES.md, and task marked complete in /TASK_CARDS.md.

Implemented taskcard_writer.py for agent/CLI updates to TASK_CARDS.md. Supports marking tasks done/cancelled, adding summary, time, and resolution. CLI interface tested. Ready for integration into main CLI entrypoint.

details.integration_note: Sample __main__.py stub provided for future CLI integration.
